lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court vacated a preliminary injunction and ruled that the lockout in the N.F.L. could continue, a victory for owners.
snippet: A federal appeals court vacated a preliminary injunction and ruled that the lockout in the N.F.L. could continue, a victory for owners.
